reviews.text: This course was excellent. I learned a lot about web development and feel confident in my skills now.
reviews.teacherAnswer: Thank you for your kind words! I'm glad you found the course helpful.

reviews.text: I found this course to be quite disappointing. The content was outdated and didn't cover some important topics.

reviews.text: I expected more hands-on activities and practical examples in this course. The theory was too overwhelming.
